channel.title: CVE Feed for WPGrim -- all

item.title: CVE-2023-26514|2024-08-02T11:53:54.218Z -- wpgrim -- dynamic%20xml%20sitemaps%20generator%20for%20google
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in WPGrim Dynamic XML Sitemaps Generator for Google plugin <= 1.3.3 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-27434|2024-08-02T14:49:15.396Z -- wpgrim -- classic%20editor%20and%20classic%20widgets
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in WPGrim Classic Editor and Classic Widgets plugin <= 1.2.5 versions.
